metadata.name: TOMIE by Junji Ito #1
metadata.description:
NFT project to celebrate the launch of the Netflix series anime "Junji Ito Maniac: Japanese Tales of the Macabre".  
This is a digital artwork created by selecting impressive frames from the popular "Tomie" manga book by Junji Ito.  
  
© JI Inc./Asahi Shimbun Publications Inc.  
© JI/Asahi Shimbun Publications, Junji Ito Maniac Production Committee
